However, the guy always shrugged her off. She had once heard that Sasuke liked girls with long hair, so she went and grew her pink hair nice and long. Still, Sasuke kept ignoring her advances to him.
Sakura was going over to the market, when she saw Sasuke at the bookstore. She went over and saw Sasuke talking to the owner.

"Hey...I'm here for...you know," said Sasuke.

"Oh, yeah that," said the bearded owner, "You know, I'm glad someone besides me into this stuff," He reached into a box, pulling out a magazine, and slipped it into a folder. Sasuke put some money on the counter, took the folder, and ran out. Sakura blinked, before turning her head to see the owner had dropped his glasses. She then realized he had horrible eyesight, and had an idea.

"Hello. I think you gave me the wrong thing," said Sakura, trying to immitate Sasuke's voice.

"I did?" asked the owner, his bad eyesight seeing Sakura as Sasuke. "And what's with your voice?"

"Uh...I swallowed a bug and its messing with my throat," went Sakura, as the man took out his box and showed her the magazine. It had a large fat girl on the cover, shocking Sakura.

"No wonder Sasuke never liked any girl here! The're too skinny!!!" thought Sakura, before looking back at the owner. "No wait, I got the right one. Sorry about that," she went, before running off. Sakura was shocked; Sasuke liked fat girls? "Alright, then I'll have to become one!"

13121111.title: Hinata's Struggle

131211111.content:
"Where on earth could she be?" Naruto muttered anxiously to himself.

On their search for Hinata, Kiba and Shino had asked any leaf ninja they could find to assist them in their search. Along the way, they encountered Naruto who had finished up his training. As soon as Kiba told him the news, Naruto quickly went into the deep forest to find Hinata. Though Kiba hated to admit it, Naruto's sage mode and nine-tails abilities made him the perfect tracker, and Naruto's incredible speed and stamina certainly didn't hurt either. Kiba and Shino continued to search along the outskirts of the forest while Naruto went in deep. However, even with his abilities, he could only very faintly sense Hinata's chakra. The fact that he could sense her gave him relief, but it would be a challenge to find her. Not one to back down from helping a friend, Naruto kept going.

**************************************************************************** ******************************

Meanwhile, with Hinata....

Meat, bread, rice, veggies, juice. It seemed like every delicacy in the world was sitting right on her table. Hinata could not figure out where exactly the woman was storing all this food, how she was able to prepare and cook it so fast, and why it was fattening her up so easily. Maybe there’s a special ingredient in the food, or perhaps it was due to her injection. Whatever the case, Hinata could not dwell on it for long as her grumbling stomach and desire to eat overwhelmed her.

For every second Hinata spent trying to figure out her situation and plan a way to escape, five more seconds were spent smelling the delicious food, thinking about that mouth-watering turkey, and wondering how many biscuits she could stuff into her mouth. Poor Hinata had to admit that whoever this woman was, she was a damn good cook. Everything was easily world-class quality. With the temptation being too great, Hinata dug in.

Hinata ate like a ravenous beast. There were no utensils on the table, so Hinata was forced to grab handfuls of food and force it into her mouth. The women seemed to prefer this method of consumption, as she let out a quiet, delighted gasp every time Hinata grabbed a particularly large amount of food and stuffed her cheeks with it. Within a minute, the large bowl of mashed potatoes intended to serve a family was devoured, and without missing a beat, the pale BBW moved on to the next dish. Hinata’s eye were unfocused, both her mind and body intent on eating as much as possible. So great was her desire that even her face had very few food stains; every wayward crumb and drop of sauce was immediately scooped up into her maw within seconds.

RRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPP

Hinata’s clothes, no longer able to hold the ever-expanding woman, began to rip and tear apart. Her jacket and shirt seemed to explode in every direction, causing what looked like a tidal wave of creamy white flesh to burst outward from the obese kunoichi. Hinata’s belly spread out everywhere in a 2-foot radius, pouring out on the table and seeping under between her legs like a fleshy apron. The large basketball sized breasts laid out on top of her belly, while three chubby chins spread out on top of them. Two flabby arms, with at least a foot of flesh hanging from them, continued to assist their attached hands and sausage-like fingers in collecting as much food as possible.

Hinata’s pants and underwear suffered a similar fate, her leggings split completely open to expose massive thighs and legs. Hinata’s butt was also set free, now large enough to consume a three-man sofa. Other than a few remaining bits of cloth, Hinata was completely naked, weighing well over 600 pounds of gorgeous flab. Hinata, who had finally been distracted from her eating due to the ripping sounds, gasped as she looked down upon herself. “W-what happened to me?! I’ve become so fat!” A mixture of shock and embarrassment caused Hinata to panic, but due to her massive weight and the effects of her injection, there wasn’t much the fat heiress could do other than blush and squirm about.

As the sounds of tearing cloth had died down, soon another sound filled the room: the joyful laughter of the mysterious kidnapper. The beautiful, thin woman laughed with a tone similar to that of a loving mother with hints of a high class woman, though one who paid attention could detect a bit of mischief in the woman’s voice.

“Oh wonderful, dear! Just wonderful!” the woman cried out, clapping her hands together. She had such a big smile on her face that one would think she won the lottery. “You’ve grown so big and beautiful. Such a pretty young girl like you deserves a nice, big dessert.” The dark-haired captor immediately ran off into the kitchen, and soon came back holding a tray of 40 freshly baked cupcakes topped with vanilla icing.

“N-no,” the obese Hyuuga stammered, “Please let me go, I can’t eat anymore.” Hinata again began to squirm in a feeble attempt to run, but all she accomplished was creating jiggling waves of fat across her body, which only made the woman even more pleased.

Pressing herself against Hinata’s body, the woman grabbed one the cupcakes and held it to Hinata’s nose. “Nonsense my dear, I could hear your stomach growling from the kitchen. You must have been starving to death in that village! Come, eat up. Have as much as you want.”

“But I….I…” Hinata’s voice trailed off as the aroma filled her nostrils. Even in the village, she had always loved the smell of freshly-baked sweets, and this cupcake smelled especially delicious. As much as she tried not to, Hinata couldn’t help but slowly open her mouth wide. Smiling, the woman placed the entire cupcake into her mouth.

“Hmmmmm!!!” An explosion of flavor filled Hinata’s mouth. It was easily the best cupcake she ever had. Despite herself, Hinata began to let out pleasurable moans as she chewed the sugary goodness to bits. It wasn’t long before the cupcake was resting comfortably in the fat girl’s stomach, but something new had overcome Hinata. The sweet treat was just so good, Hinata wanted to eat more. Before, Hinata gorged herself due to the effects of the injection driving her to eat. But now it was different, she wanted to experience that wonderful taste again. She wanted to fill her belly more. She felt so...hungry.

Becoming restless, Hinata opened her mouth again expectantly, her breaths becoming short due to her overwhelming need to eat more sweets. The woman was more than happy to oblige, placing another cupcake into her mouth. Similar to a drug addict getting their fix, Hinata calmed down and starting chewing with vigor.

“Good girl” cooed the black-haired woman. The mysterious woman then placed the tray on Hinata’s large belly, and began feeding her one cupcake after another. The captor’s left hand fed the cupcakes, while the right hand massaged and groped Hinata’s massive backside.

As she continued feeding Hinata, the woman whispered soothingly to her, “It must have been so hard, dear, living in that village with nothing to eat but tiny scraps. But everything is okay now. You can live a new life here, and eat as much as you’ve always wanted. I'll cook for you, clean you, and treat you like the princess you deserve to be.”

In any other situation, Hinata would have dismissed this woman as insane, but something inside her made her consider the woman’s words. Maybe she’s right. Life in Konoha was nothing but constant stress. Missions were never enjoyable. They always ranged between mind-numbingly boring and downright horrifying. Her friends, as nice as they were, never really saw her as anything but a weak puppy to root for. And as much as they tried to convince her otherwise, Hinata could always see the disappointment in her team’s faces whenever she messed up. Then Hinata would go home to her family, only for them to constantly berate her for being a failure, which would end up with Hinata crying herself to sleep in her bed. It seemed like all Hinata had was Naruto to live for, but Naruto would ignore her most the time, and only interacted with her when he didn’t have a choice. What WAS the point of it all?

As if she could sense Hinata’s dark thoughts, the woman spoke up,”See? You don’t need that village. Just live here with me from now on and forget about those people. Now here, there’s still one left”, the woman held up the last cupcake to Hinata’s mouth.

“Th-thank you” Hinata said with a more determined look across her face. Opening her mouth, Hinata took in the cupcake and savored every bite. She didn’t give her captor an answer, but the woman seemed intent on keeping Hinata here, and the Hyuuga heiress didn't seem to mind. Once Hinata finished her cupcake, the woman’s features brightened again.

“Such a good princess!” the woman squealed. Hinata took note of the woman’s usage of ‘princess’. “Now my dear, I have to admit I cheated a bit by giving you dessert so early, but I just couldn’t resist you getting nice and big.”

“So early?” Hinata piped up, “w-what do you mean early?”

“Well my dear, let’s just say I’ve got really good news for you.” The woman then leaned further into Hinata’s flab and whispered into her ear, “That was only the appetizer.”
131211111.title: A New Life

I’ll make sure to put extra whip cream and sugar on them just for you, sweetie pie. I’ll even throw in 80 pounds of my special banana pudding.”

“Ah-...ohhh”, Hinata moaned at hearing the woman list off the delicious food. It all just sounded so good. Hinata just couldn’t resist her hunger anymore. She was forever a slave to the woman’s delicious food.

“Don’t worry princess, mommy will be right back!” the kimono-clad lady cheered out.

Not waiting to keep her fat princess waiting, the woman picked up the tray and ran back into the kitchen. In mere moments, she brought out an insane amount of food. Hinata once again wondered how and where she got all the food from, but she had more important things to think about. With each dish placed on top of the empty plates, Hinata’s belly groaned louder. The aroma was practically hypnotizing. And sure enough, the food was indeed greater than the previous amount. The table nearly overflowed with all the meat, vegetables, and fish placed on the table. Hinata felt her mouth water with hunger. She needed to eat or she would go insane. With each passing second Hinata was brought to her breaking point.

“Now dig in!”

With an almost bestial roar of hunger, Hinata ravaged her meal. Chubby hands grasped as much as they could hold and fed it into the obese girl’s maw. Hinata grabbed bigger handfuls and took bigger bites than she ever did before. Not only was there more food, but the taste was worlds better than the “appetizer” she just had. Just like with the cupcakes, Hinata desperately ate at the food just to experience the wonderful taste, and the incredible sensation of sating her appetite. She ate and ate, all the while her captor, or rather, her new mother cheered her on…
1312111111.title: The next feast begins

13121111111.content:
‘Maybe this isn’t so bad.’

Rational thought didn’t come easy to Hinata anymore in her haze of hunger and flavor-induced ecstasy. Right now most of her brain power was dedicated towards enjoying the 20 turkeys provided to her, 10 of which she had already eaten. Then she could move on to the 80 fully-cooked salmon, and the 30 bowls of ramen, and everything else that was piled upon the dinner table.

Hinata could feel her nude body expand by the second. By now she must have weighed at least 900 pounds, and showed no signs of stopping. The girl idly wondered how big she would get once this was all over, and this was just dinner. There was still the massive dessert that she was promised, which she found herself looking forward to.

The words of Hinata’s captor echoed through her mind. The woman had promised Hinata a new life, where she could eat as much as she’s “always wanted”. The idea that all she wanted in life was to constantly eat seemed so crazy at first, but Hinata couldn’t help but enjoy the idea. It was like setting herself free from the constraints of society, defying every silly little demand it made of her. There was no more responsibility or obligation; instead it was replaced by shameless indulgence and delicious food. Living a life of endless gluttony grew more appealing by the second. Even the feeling of being morbidly obese, which had previously disgusted her, now excited her in a way. Here she was, an enormous naked blob of fat, becoming so voracious and hungry that people would have to serve her hand and foot just to keep her nice and fed. And the person who had to serve her wasn’t upset about it at all. On the contrary, the woman WANTED to feed Hinata and tend to her every possible need. In Konoha, Hinata was a burden, but here, she was like a queen.

‘Oh god, I love it’, Hinata thought frantically while stuffing food into her mouth, ‘It all tastes so good. I want more. I can’t stop. I want to get fatter. I want to be so big I can’t even move. I never want to do anything else but eat. I want to eat forever. I need more. I’m so hungry. I’m so HUNGRY!’

Hinata’s already frantic consumption turned into an all out frenzy. She ripped at the turkey she was holding with inhumanly large bites. Her mouth stretched out wide to take in as much meat as she could. The room filled with sounds of Hinata’s moans of pleasure along with growls and groans of hunger. It didn’t seem like dinner would be lasting much longer.

And all the while, her “mother” looked on with a smile of love and pride. A wanted criminal, and one of the greatest chefs of the world, her name was Sayoko.
13121111111.title: Later that night

131211111111.content:
Sayoko was once seen as one of the greatest cooks in the entire world. From the very moment she was born, she was a lover of food. Sayoko refused to involve herself in anything unless it was related to cooking or housework. As a child, her preferred toys were spatulas and sponges. Any books she read were cookbooks. Any classes she had a choice in taking were always related to cooking in some way. It came as no surprise to anyone that Sayoko’s career was that of a restaurant owner. As soon as she reached 18, she left the house to start her restaurant, and did everything she could to improve her cooking skills as much as possible. Sayoko truly loved what she did. It was often said that if she could spend every waking moment of her life making and feeding food, then she would be living the perfect life.

That statement was half-true. However, there was always one major desire that Sayoko was never able to achieve. A desire stronger than most people could imagine it, and a desire that would ultimately lead to her downfall. It was the desire to have a daughter of her own, and feed her into obesity. Though she never said it out loud, Sayoko had a major… preference towards getting people fat. Sayoko always treated people with absolute kindness, but she always tried to get people to eat as much as she could. Her restaurant meals were bigger than any other restaurant. Her desserts were made extra fattening, and she was always talking to customers and finding ways to offer them more food. What was more interesting was that Sayoko seemed to be drawn towards feeding younger girls. Any young girls that came into the restaurant were practically treated like royalty, so much so that customers often joked that she might steal a girl away. If only they knew how accurate that was.

Unfortunately, Sayoko was born with a rare genetic condition that rendered her unable to bear children. Despite her radiant beauty, this made her undesirable by many men who wanted, and in some cases needed, to continue their bloodline. Considering how important bloodlines are in shinobi society, this was a massive obstacle for Sayoko’s dream.

Many years later, at 30 years old, Sayoko eventually came under hard times when it was discovered that her food had certain chemicals in it that were linked to severe weight gain. Sayoko had developed such chemicals herself a couple years back as it improved the taste of her food, and satisfied her “preference”. But in a world that demands that all shinobi remain thin and combat-ready, Sayoko’s restaurant was forced to change its recipes. Sayoko worked around this issue by finding ways to offer food, particular to young girls, which still had her weight-altering ingredients in it. There was one girl in particular that Sayoko was particularly drawn to, a 13 year old girl named Miki. She befriended the young girl, and treated her like a daughter. Eventually she groomed Miki to the point that Sayoko was able to convince her to spend the night at her house. Sayoko then cooked an enormous feast and fed it to Miki. However, Miki was only able to eat half of the feast until her parents found her. By that time, Miki had gained enough weight to be around 400 pounds. Horrified, the parents immediately removed Miki from the house and reported Sayoko to the authorities. Under threat of legal action, Sayoko fled, and has been in hiding ever since.

Sayoko did not let this deter her though. In the end, all Sayoko really wanted was a daughter who she could love and feed. She didn’t need the close-minded restrictions of society. Using her skill in cooking, she gained favors across the world by offering food to any homeless people, wandering bandits, or missing nin on the run. By doing so, she was able to gain enough favor and money from missing nin groups that she was taught several forms of advanced ninjutsu, particularly those involving the creation and formation of matter so she could produce an endless supply of food. Using her knowledge and techniques, she was able to build herself a house deep in the middle of the forest. She would then quietly scout around the forest, watchful for any female stragglers who were lost in the forest and needed a meal, hopeful for the day that she would find the perfect girl.

And then on that fateful day, she finally found the girl that would be her new daughter: Hyuuga Hinata.

Hinata was truly the perfect girl. Young body, beautiful face, adorably polite, soft pearly skin, and a wonderful appetite. Sure, she had to “persuade” her a little bit with her injection, but Hinata ate with such enthusiasm that Sayoko was convinced that Hinata was truly a girl who was meant to be nice and fat. The injection after all was nothing more than a medicine tainted with genjutsu that slightly increased a person's appetite and made them unable to leave the house. Nonstop eating was never part of the injection; it was entirely her own desire that even Hinata had not realized.

Even though not even a day has passed, Sayoko had already adopted Hinata in her mind. The fact that a shy girl was lost in the forest made her believe that Hinata was probably a loner, and thus Sayoko felt no guilt in whisking the young teen away from whatever awful home she came from.

Seeing the fat, pale girl eat brought Sayoko such joy that she almost wanted to cry. Life couldn’t get any better. She could finally cook to her heart’s content, and now she finally had her own child to feed as much as she wanted. It wasn’t long until Hinata devoured every last scrap of her dinner, and Sayoko wasted no time in placing the “real” dessert onto the table. There was just no end to the pale girl's appetite. As soon as Sayoko began placing the dozens of cakes and pies onto the table, Hinata once again began to squirm and whimper in hunger, and her gigantic belly started to growl unbearably loud.

"Oh-oh kami, it looks so good," Hinata whimpered, "there's so much food. *GROAN* Oh no. I'm getting hungry again." Hinata began to reach for the food, but Sayoko firmly pushed her arm away.

"Not yet my princess," teased Sayoko, "I still have to place 30 more pies and the banana pudding on the table." Then Sayoko leaned forward towards Hinata and spoke with an almost seductive tone, "Patience my lovely baby girl. If you behave, I'll let you have some of my special peanut butter chocolate fudge ice cream. I'll add in 40 gallons of it if you'll be a good girl."

Hinata, or rather her belly, responded with a rumble so load it almost felt like the room shook. The white eyed princess shook in a panic by the promise of even more food. Literally every fiber of her being was screaming for more, and Hinata simply didn't have the will to resist it.

"P-please...I must have it..I-I'll be good..." the poor obese teen shook at the mere possibility that she might lose the chance to eat more if she didn't do as she was told.

"Mommy," stated a smiling Sayoko, "I'm your mommy now. Tell mommy you'll be good."

Hinata immediately responded with no hesitation or dignity, "Y-yes mommy. I'll be a good girl. Please let me eat mommy's food."

Sayoko almost squealed in happiness at being called a mommy for the first time in her life. With a spring in her step, Sayoko placed the rest of the dessert on the table as quickly as she could. Though she didn't mind the occasional tease, Sayoko would never truly deny her daughter, and she was more than willing to reward Hinata's good behavior with more food. In a few minutes, dessert was fully prepared. The large table was completely covered with all manner of sweets, all topped with an enormous pot of banana pudding placed right in front of the obese kunoichi.

Two weeks have passed since the disappearance of Hinata Hyuuga. Despite the efforts of both the Hyuuga clan and the ANBU, almost no clues were found regarding her whereabouts. All anyone knew was that she was last seen in the forest, and that Naruto somehow encountered her but got lost. During the search on the night of the disappearance, Naruto was found fast asleep in the forest. After being found and woken by Kiba and Shino, the blonde teen spoke in hysterics over Hinata being stuck in a fairytale dream house and being really, really fat. Nobody believed Naruto’s story, but they did suspect that he might have been hit with a genjutsu that caused him to see a fairy tale house. Naruto however, insisted that everything he saw was not a genjutsu, but unfortunately he had little luck convincing anyone of his story. It was just too ridiculous to believe.

What frustrated Naruto more than anything was the rather lackadaisical effort being put into the search for the missing kunoichi. The official reason given to him was that the village had higher priorities to focus on rather than a single missing ninja, which Naruto had to admit was somewhat true. Stopping the Akatsuki and rebuilding the village were indeed the most important things at the moment. It still didn’t justify why they had only a couple ANBU on the rescue mission, nor the fact that the Hyuuga stopped searching after the first week. He knew that the only reason the Hyuuga searched at all was for the sake of keeping up their image, and it angered him to see a family so uncaring for one from their own clan. He knew that Hiashi and Hinata didn’t have the best relationship, but this was just messed up. Kiba and Shino, though worried, seemed confident in the idea that maybe Hinata had simply run away for a while, and that she was too timid to go too far from the village. Maybe that was true, but it still bothered Naruto to see everyone so eager to put Hinata on the backburner.

But none of those compared to what truly bothered him. Oh no, it was when he saw that. The enormous mass of fat, the blubbery layers of soft skin, the huge stomach that stretched so far, the huge, bouncy thighs and wide hips, the big, bountiful breasts, and most of all, the white eyes and blue hair that made him so certain it was her. It had to have been real, he knew that was no genjutsu. But it was hard to convince even himself of it. After all, Hinata was known to be extremely thin, weighing no more than 100 pounds. The idea of the girl being huge was silly, but the image of what he saw haunted him ever since. So much so that Naruto found himself watching all the overweight women in the village. He never gave big women a second glance before, but now he couldn’t take his eyes off them. The way they ate, walked, and how their fat jiggled with every step. The bigger the woman, the more Naruto stared. One in particular he took note of was a heavy set young woman that often pigged out at a barbeque restaurant with her mother. The mother seemed to love feeding her daughter as much as possible, ordering large meals and insisting that her baby girl eat up every bite. The young girl would then shamelessly indulge herself in gluttony while her mother encouraged her all the while. Naruto couldn’t help but imagine himself in the mother’s position, spoiling a girl to obesity and purposely pushing her give in to her forbidden desires. What’s more was that he often imagined the girl to be the image of Hinata, turned into an obese caricature of what she used to be, with Naruto forcing food down her throat so she could grow more and more.

As the dark desires overcame him, Naruto found himself back into the forest where Hinata was last seen. He used his ninetails-enhanced senses to their maximum, and was confident that he would find her. No matter how strong her captor, nothing could evade his jinchuuriki senses. Soon enough, he was able to find a signal of Hinata’s chakra. It was faint, but it was there, and the blonde teen did his best to track it down. However, it seemed that no matter how close he got, he couldn’t find it. He would suddenly notice that he somehow passed up Hinata’s chakra signal, and then turn around to find it, only to once again suddenly find it far away from him. Perhaps this was another way to keep him out? Naruto, ever a resourceful boy, thought of a possible way to track her. He remembered that there was another woman in the house, who was probably the one that knocked him out before. She was probably prepared for Naruto this time around, so Naruto decided that it would best to lead her to him instead. Making a hand sign, the boy shouted, “Sexy Jutsu!”

In a puff of smoke, the once blonde boisterous teen was replaced by a beautiful blonde haired girl wearing a baby blue sundress with pigtails. Naruto had figured that coming off as a vulnerable young girl would be less threatening that his usual form, so he instead decided to disguise himself as the gorgeous Naruko, though without the whisker marks so as to avoid suspicion. Though feeling slightly foolish, Naruko did her best to walk in a way that looked scared and timid. For the first few minutes, nothing changed, but after a while Naruko noticed that the once faint chakra signals were getting stronger by the second. It was working! With renewed confidence, she walked faster to reach the signal, and after a while she came across a set of trees close together that had what looked to be light coming through the openings. When Naruko peeked through it, she saw it, the same house that she encountered two weeks ago.

‘YES!’ cheered Naruko in her mind. The plan was a success, and Naruko knew that taking the form of a girl must have somehow granted her entrance. Resuming her acting, Naruko timidly walked slowly to the forest, before freezing suddenly when the door opened. From the house door walked a beautiful woman with long black hair and a white kimono.
